title: On the use OF 1H-NMR chemical shifts and thermodynamic data for the prediction of the predominant conformation of organic molecules in solution: the example of the flavonoid rutin
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19619-19635
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03430A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Haroldo C. Da Silva, Wagner B. De Almeida
Among 44 DFT fully optimized structures (named 1–44), located on the potential energy surface for flavonoid rutin, only the φ1, φ2 manually rotated structure 32, yielded an almost perfect agreement with the 1H-NMR experimental spectrum (in DMSO-d6).
